description: This file sets up and performs a hybrid search on a knowledge base of recipes stored in a PostgreSQL database, utilizing vector search capabilities.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base loaded from PDF URLs, supporting vector search.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for interacting with a PostgreSQL vector database, supporting different search types.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base data, with options to recreate and upsert.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search query on the vector database with a specified limit.
